values: 向；朝着；朝向；面向；接近；趋向；将近（某一时间）；达到（目的）；靠近（某地）；对；关于；（钱）用于

sample.mean: adv. 向前；朝前；向前进；迈向成功；向将来；往后；提前；在船头；在飞机头部；朝向对方球门

word_group.brief_definition: 用于支付...的部分款项；（钱）花在...上
接近年底；接近尾声；临近终点
迈向统一的步骤；迈向联合的步骤；朝向统一的步骤

bilingual.source: The spy moved very suddenly towards me.
Then they set off again towards the East.
bilingual.target: 然后他们再次出发向东走去。

bilingual.source: You will go through storms towards the sea.
bilingual.target: 你会经历风暴驶向大海。

bilingual.source: She hurried towards it, and knocked on the door.
bilingual.target: 她急忙走向它，并敲了敲门。

bilingual.source: The farmer steered the ship towards the island of gold.
Instead she got up and walked quietly towards the yeti.
bilingual.target: 相反，她站起来，悄悄地走向雪人。

bilingual.source: Alistair ran towards Jonny, caught him and started pulling him towards the finish line.
bilingual.target: 阿利斯泰尔跑向乔尼，抓住他并开始拉他向终点线前进。

bilingual.source: Alistair pushed himself towards the finish line in the burning heat.
bilingual.target: 阿利斯泰尔在炙热中向终点线冲去。

bilingual.source: Nervously, very nervously, they both crept towards the open front door.
bilingual.target: 紧张地，非常紧张地，他们俩爬向敞开的前门。

yingyinNormal.en: You're the best, dude! Walking up towards that stage, I felt like I was floating. My heart was beating so fast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是最棒的，兄弟！走向舞台的时候，我感觉整个人在飘。我的心跳的那么的快。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Maya, you know the good thing about having a nice clock? Once you fix it, it will always point you towards your Christmas future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，玛雅，你知道破钟有什么好处吗？一旦你把它修好，它会将你指向你的圣诞未来。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it would just freak him out. Listen, before we leave, I should warn you, I'm a passionate man and I tend towards public displays of affection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 才不咧，那会吓坏他的，听着，在出发之前，我要警告你，我是个热情的男人，倾向于公开地表达我炙热的感情。

yingyinNormal.en: Hyde Park is perhaps the most famous with its man-made lake, The Serpentine, and on the other side, Kensington Gardens is a beautiful open expanse that stretches east towards Kensington Palace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 海德公园也许是因为其人工湖 The Serpentine 而闻名，在另一边，肯辛顿花园是一个美丽而广阔的休憩地点，并延绵向东通往肯辛顿宫。

yingyinNormal.en: If we're leaning towards quantum coupling...
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们侧重于量子耦合。

yingyinNormal.en: Sooner or later darker minds will turn towards Erebor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑暗迟早吞噬孤山。

yingyinNormal.en: What excuse can you give for your behavior towards him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对他的所作所为又能给出什么借口？

yingyinNormal.en: This is real footage of them moving towards a flash of light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这段实拍录像中就能看出它们的趋光性。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh-huh, yeah. Do I stay in the jungle or go towards the beach?
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道了，我现在应该守在丛林里还是去海滩？

yingyinNormal.en: London will always be a city that looks towards the past and the future in equal measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于过去和将来，伦敦这座城市同样重视。

yingyinNormal.en: Could we create a decoy? Send troops towards one of the gates and just send an attack on another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 调虎离山如何？派军队去其中一个大门，然后在另一个门发动攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: And right now, the Hermes is heading towards you, starting it's months long deceleration intercept.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，赫尔墨斯号正朝着你开始数月之久的减速被捕获之旅。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's exactly the answer we gave to the question: What is your attitude towards online dating?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们问到这个问题的时候，我们就是这么回答的：你对在线交友持何态度？

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me. At what point did he realize the depth of your indifference towards him? I‘m not indifferent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我，他是什么时候开始彻底明白了你对他其实是根本不在乎的？我没不在乎他。

yingyinNormal.en: Maintain 1-5000, Delta 3-3-1. We've lost thrust on both engines. We are turning back towards LaGuardia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 4500米保持，达美航空331。我们的双发都停车了，现在返回拉瓜迪亚机场。

yingyinNormal.en: Enough. You ran to a Gorg? He runs towards the danger? What kind of Boov is he? He is like a Super Boov.
yingyinNormal.zh: 够了。你遇上过格尔族？他不惧险阻？他是个怎样的波波啊？超级波波？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. My treat. It's just, you know it burns me up to see folks with such backward attitudes towards foxes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用，我请了，主要是听到别人对狐狸有偏见我就受不了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, like, when you were like running towards the swings or running away from Satan? The neighbor's dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 例如要跑去玩荡秋千，或是在躲“撒旦”时？邻居的狗。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, when the earth does get pushed a little bit towards the sun, the sun's pull speeds it up a little bit, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯哼，这样说好了，当地球真的受到来自太阳引力影响往太阳靠近时，太阳拉力也会使得地球运行速度相对增加一些些。

yingyinNormal.en: The other problem is that the farther we move back in time towards the top of the tree, the less evidence we have about the languages there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一个问题是我们沿着系谱树回溯越接近树的顶端，关于语言的证据就越少。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 接近; 靠近; 将近
为了; 有助于; 用于

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 接近年底；接近尾声；临近终点

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）
prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

examination_example.sentence: What is the author's attitude <highlight>towards</highlight> the proposal?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者关于该提议的态度是什么？

examination_example.sentence: The author's attitude <highlight>towards</highlight> what Brendon Lynch said in his blog is one of skepticism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者对布兰登·林奇在博客中所说的持怀疑态度。

examination_example.sentence: John Donahue's attitude <highlight>towards</highlight> the public-sector system is one of disapproval.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰·多纳休对公共部门系统的态度是不赞成的。

examination_example.sentence: In Britain the move <highlight>towards</highlight> open access publishing has been driven by funding bodies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，开放获取出版是由资助机构推动的。

examination_example.sentence: In effect, fewer federal funds today are going <highlight>towards</highlight> the agency's other work — such as forest conservation, watershed and cultural resources management.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，如今越来越少的联邦资金用于该机构其他工作，如森林保护、流域和文化资源管理。

examination_example.sentence: Our gender, ethnicity, age and social class will encourage us <highlight>towards</highlight> certain interpretations but at the same time obscure or even close off others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的性别、种族、年龄和社会阶层会鼓励我们做出某些解释，但同时也会掩盖甚至封闭其他解释。

sense_info_list.en: If things develop towards a particular situation, that situation becomes nearer in time or more likely to happen.

examination_example.sentence: Brexit is seen by some as an opportunity to reverse a recent trend <highlight>towards</highlight> the UK importing food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人认为，英国脱欧是扭转近期英国进口食品趋势的一个机会。

examination_example.sentence: "It surely seems plausible that happy people would be more forward-thinking and creative and lean <highlight>towards</highlight> R&D more than the average," said one researcher.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位研究人员说：“快乐的人比一般人更有远见和创造力，更倾向于研发，这似乎是合理的。”

examination_example.sentence: British land artists preferred to get away from towns, gravitating <highlight>towards</highlight> landscapes that are traditionally considered beautiful such as the Wiltshire Downs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的地景艺术家更喜欢远离城镇，被传统上被认为美丽的风景所吸引，如威尔特郡丘陵地区。

sense_info_list.en: near to, just before, or around a time or place
sense_info_list.zh: 接近; 靠近; 将近

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Towards</highlight> the end of Overdressed, Cline introduced her ideal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在《盛装打扮》的结尾，克莱恩介绍了她的理想。

sense_info_list.en: for the purpose of buying or achieving something
sense_info_list.zh: 为了; 有助于; 用于

sample.mean: adv. 向前；朝前；向前进；迈向成功；向将来；往后；提前；在船头；在飞机头部；朝向对方球门

exam_freq_info.chinese: 为了; 有助于; 用于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers said they investigated individuals' attitudes <highlight>towards</highlight> mathematics because of what could be referred to as a mathematics crisis in the UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，因为英国出现了一场数学危机，所以他们调查了个人对数学的态度，。

examination_example.sentence: This means they have overwhelming negative emotions <highlight>towards</highlight> the subject, ranging from rage to despair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着他们对这个话题有着压倒性的负面情绪，从愤怒到绝望。

examination_example.sentence: Help them build a positive attitude <highlight>towards</highlight> life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助他们建立积极的生活态度。

sense_info_list.en: If things develop towards a particular situation, that situation becomes nearer in time or more likely to happen.

examination_example.sentence: School leaders must be brave enough to make the leap <highlight>towards</highlight> reimagining schools as providers of health as well as education services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校领导必须有足够的勇气迈出这一大步，将学校重新定位为卫生和教育服务的提供者。

examination_example.sentence: You need to recognize each step of progress you take <highlight>towards</highlight> achieving your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要认识到你朝着目标前进的每一步。

examination_example.sentence: It's a great way for me to relieve stress and pressure and dance my way <highlight>towards</highlight> feeling energetic and happy again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，这是一种很好的方式来缓解压力，通过跳舞使自己精力充沛和快乐。

examination_example.sentence: It brought cars closer <highlight>towards</highlight> the reach of ordinary people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它拉近了汽车与普通人的距离。

sense_info_list.en: for the purpose of buying or achieving something
sense_info_list.zh: 为了; 有助于; 用于

examination_example.sentence: I managed to sell a lot of my old furniture and put that extra money <highlight>towards</highlight> the new material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我设法卖掉了许多旧家具，把多余的钱用在新材料上。

sample.mean: adv. 向前；朝前；向前进；迈向成功；向将来；往后；提前；在船头；在飞机头部；朝向对方球门

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）
prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

examination_example.sentence: Walking up a path through the forest <highlight>towards</highlight> Shutlingsloe, a local high point, I came across a small clearing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沿着一条穿过森林的小路向当地的高地Shutlingsloe走去，我无意间来到了一块小空地。

examination_example.sentence: My heart froze in my chest as I saw the tractor heading <highlight>towards</highlight> the motorway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我看到拖拉机驶向高速公路时，我的心都僵住了。

examination_example.sentence: The Smoudwater Canal is moving <highlight>towards</highlight> reopening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯茂德沃特运河即将重新开放。

sample.mean: adv. 向前；朝前；向前进；迈向成功；向将来；往后；提前；在船头；在飞机头部；朝向对方球门

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）
prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于；接近达到；接近；将近

word_family.mean: prep. 向；朝；往；到；对；跟；与；属于；附于；归于；对于；关于；使；比；记入

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 用于支付...的部分款项；（钱）花在...上

examination_example.sentence: As he made his way <highlight>towards</highlight> the building, he noticed a field to his right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他走向大楼时，他注意到右边有一片田野。

examination_example.sentence: He confidently (自信地) continued to work <highlight>towards</highlight> his dream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他自信地继续朝着自己的梦想努力。

examination_example.sentence: The sailing ship was going <highlight>towards</highlight> the sunset.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帆船正驶向日落。

examination_example.sentence: People are asked to change attitudes (态度) <highlight>towards</highlight> environmental problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们被要求改变对于环境问题的态度。

examination_example.sentence: Boys and girls have different attitudes (态度) <highlight>towards</highlight> friendship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于友谊，男孩和女孩有不同的态度。

examination_example.sentence: Parents have different opinions <highlight>towards</highlight> the change of uniform.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于校服的改变，家长们意见不一。

sample.mean: adv. 向前；朝前；向前进；迈向成功；向将来；往后；提前；在船头；在飞机头部；朝向对方球门
